data.name: Apex Construct Demo
data.detailed_description:
ACCOLADES


About the Game

Try the first level of VR single player action/adventure Apex Construct. With two AIs locked in a drawn-out conflict, the main game lets you wield an upgradable bow & shield combination, explore the shattered world and solve its puzzles through 12 missions filled with robotic enemies and secrets to uncover.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a VR Headset + 1 USB 3.0 port for Vive, 1 for Windows Mixed Reality, 3 for Oculus Rift
